ValidationRule.description: Must enter a reason if status is On Hold or Roadblock
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: RecordType.DeveloperName ='Sales_Implementation_Case' && ( ISPICKVAL( IT_Parcel_Status__c, "On Hold") || ISPICKVAL( IT_Parcel_Status__c, "Roadblock - Customer") || ISPICKVAL( IT_Parcel_Status__c, "Roadblock - Internal")) && ISPICKVAL( IT_Reason__c, "")
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please choose a reason if the status is on hold or road block
